name: Shape Racer Extreme
description:
Two player racing game. You and a friend can play on the same keyboard. One person uses wsad, the other uses the arrow keys.

For maximum points and speed, complete the level without jumping.

Run over the fire for a extra boost, but beware for the snow because you will lose control for a little while! 

Special Keys: + / -  Will change the maximum speed for all box racers.

r - will reset the level.
